author: Thomas Smith

title: Setting Up a Withdrawal Plan for Your 401(k) or IRA
description: This blog post explores different strategies for withdrawing funds from your 401(k) or IRA during retirement. Learn about options like hardship withdrawals, loans, SEPP, and more, along with tips for creating a personalized withdrawal plan.
author: Amelia Jones

title: How to Avoid Impulse Buys with a Minimalist Mindset
description: This blog post explores the journey from impulsive shopping to a mindful, minimalist approach. It shares practical tips and strategies for avoiding impulse buys, setting a budget, and making intentional purchases that align with your values and needs. Learn how to prioritize experiences and relationships over material possessions and achieve a more fulfilling life.
author: Elijah Taylor

title: Creating a Steady Income Stream in Retirement
description: This blog post outlines strategies for building a diversified income stream in retirement beyond relying solely on pensions and Social Security.  It covers various income sources, including real estate, annuities, and dividend stocks, offering a step-by-step guide for financial security during your golden years.
author: Evelyn Williams

title: College Savings Plans for Your Children
description: This guide provides a comprehensive overview of college savings plans, including 529 plans, Coverdell ESAs, custodial accounts, and IRAs. Learn about tax advantages, contribution limits, eligibility requirements, and more to make informed decisions for your child's education.
author: Charlotte Thompson

title: How Women Can Build Financial Confidence
description: This blog post provides a comprehensive guide for women to build financial confidence, outlining practical strategies for continuous learning, active engagement in financial discussions, seeking professional guidance, and embracing role models. It emphasizes the importance of starting small, understanding finances, and fostering open communication within relationships.
author: Riley Williams
